Basic constructor.
BoolChannel - Class in faulty
A simple class modelling the behavior of bool channel by means of using BDDs the channel is modeled in the following way: el_n -> el_n-1 -> ... -> el_0 The elements are stored in an array els, being els_ used for storing their primed versions, array oc (and oc_) serve for indicating if an given position of the channel is occupied or not.
BoolChannel(String, int, BDDModel) - Constructor for class faulty.BoolChannel
The constructor of the class it creates all the BDD's needed for the channel
BoolChannel(int, BDDModel) - Constructor for class faulty.BoolChannel
The constructor of the class it creates all the BDD's needed for the channel
BoolExp - Interface in faulty
 
Branch - Class in faulty
Models a branch of a process of the style: Guard -> Command it contains a reference to its process, a guard and a code, the code to be executed when the guard is true
Branch(BoolExp, Code, boolean, Process) - Constructor for class faulty.Branch
Basic constructor for the class

getBDDwithScheduler() - Method in class faulty.Program
Returns the BDD representing the program, we use a simple scheduler: [1,..,1] one position for each process, one a process is executed we set the corresponding position to 0 and continue with the following one.

NegIntExp - Class in faulty
Class representing the subtraction of two integers: exp1 - exp2 The result is stored in an array of bits (BDD) Note that this operation in for UNSIGNED Ints,then no negative numbers are used We use a complement method to calculate the subtraction, using the implemented sum, more efficient (in space) methods need to be implemented
NegIntExp(IntExp, IntExp, BDDModel) - Constructor for class faulty.NegIntExp
Basic constructor of the class

Process - Class in faulty
Process is a basic class to capture the behavior of a process, it contains the basic information of a process: a list of vars, the channels used, etc.
Process(String, int, int, int, int, BDDModel) - Constructor for class faulty.Process
Basic constructor for class Process, it creates the basic structures for the class
Process(String, int, int, int, int, BDDModel, boolean) - Constructor for class faulty.Process
Another constructor for class Process, it creates the basic structures for the class and allows to set disableBlocking
Program - Class in faulty
This class defines a FAULTY program, it provides the basic structures: a list of channels, separating in bool and int channels, and a factory to construct the BDD's correspondong to the program.

Basic constructor for the class, it creates the required lists and a factory for the BDDs

Another constructor for the class, it creates the required lists and a factory for the BDDs

VarInt - Class in faulty
This class implements the basics for UNSIGNED integer variables the class SInteger, provides the behavior ofr signed integers, by implementation unsigned integers use less BDD vars, thus are more amenable for symbolic model checking.
